name: MagicRules
0:
”Alexa, ask Magic Rules to list the legalities for Black Lotus”
”Alexa, ask Magic Rules can I play Academy Drake in future”
”Alexa, ask Magic Rules what are the rulings for Fiend Hunter”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: magic rules
des: Settle the score with your magic friends by easily asking for the ruling on Magic the Gathering cards. You can all check to see if your card is legal in a certain type of deck. Or even just list all the decks that a card is legal in.
